summary: A command‑line script that sets up an unsupervised InfoGraph training pipeline on graph datasets using DGL and PyTorch. It parses arguments, defines a collate helper for graph batching, loads a GIN dataset, trains the InfoGraph model, and evaluates the learned node embeddings.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run example for researchers and engineers to apply unsupervised graph representation learning with InfoGraph, facilitating experimentation and benchmarking of graph embeddings for downstream tasks.
